resources.string: All forgotten words has been loaded correctly.
You are using the app as anonymous user. It is advised to create personalized account in order to not lose your learning progress.

No network connection, couldn\'t synchronize personalizations now’
Internet Connection Lost… Words Sets could not be synchronized.
Please connect with internet to download words!

Database doesn\'t contain wordset categories! Emergency mode.

Database doesn\'t contain wordsets! Emergency mode.
given keyword hasn\'t been found in dictionary…

The word to show details has not been found!

In order to buy mnemoney select one of the option below and pay with Google Wallet. In spite of virtual currency you can also get full access. Mnemoney enable you to unlock sets of vocabulary on each available platform.
An error has encountered. Please contact with us. Transaction code:
An error was encountered while attaining full access.. Please contact technical support on mnemobox.com

An error was encountered while unlocking access… Please contact technical support on mnemobox.com

Znalazłeś błąd w aplikacji? Zrobiłbyś coś inaczej? Wpisz tutaj swoje uwagi odnośnie aplikacji, proponowanych zmian. Jesteśmy otwarci na wszelkie propozycje ulepszeń.
mnemobox.com - Learn English Language with Google Play app.
Please sign in to be able to synchronize personalizations.
